name: afk
description: Marks players as AFK if they stop moving & chatting for a set period of time
author: Shock

auto-afk.description: Automatically mark a player as AFK when the Auto AFK Timeout is reached

auto-afk-timeout.description: Number of minutes to wait until a player is marked as AFK

auto-afk-maxtimeout.description: Number of additional minutes to wait before taking action on a player that has been marked as AFK

auto-afk-action.description: Action to take after the Auto AFK Max Timeout is reached

auto-afk-exclusions.description: Roles to exclude from Auto AFK Action

allow-manual-afk.description: Allow players to manually go AFK using the /afk command

afk-announce.description: If there are players marked as AFK when others join, notify them

args.name: reason
args.description: Optional reason for going AFK displayed to other players

commands.name: /afkers
commands.description: List players currently marked as AFK
